lines.text: That guy's a maniac! Why'd he bite me?

[as Leon is running on a catwalk, Ada appears behind him]
Leon... I've been waiting for you, Leon...
[points gun at him]
What are you doing?
You know what this is about... so just hand over the G-Virus...
I don't believe this... Annette was right... about everything!

[walks forward]
That's why I told you to leave without me, but you wouldn't listen! Now hand it over! Don't make me shoot you.
You can't do that.
[pause, and Ada lowers the gun]
[screams as Annette shoots her from behind, and she begins to fall off the railing of the bridge]

[Runs and grabs her hand, stopping her from falling to her death]
Ada! Ada, I've got you! Don't give up!
The G-Virus... G... Virus...
[passes out from earlier wounds]
Leon... it's over, just... let me go...
Shut up! You're going to make it!
It's too late, Leon... we both know it...
No! I promised you that we would escape! You just have to help me out here!
I... really... wanted... to escape with you Leon... escape from... everything... goodbye...
[Leon loses his grip and Ada falls]
Ada!
[fall to his knees, hitting the floor with his hands]
No!
[slowly gets up and pulls out the G-Virus vial taken from Annette]
So... this is what everyone's been dying for...
[throws it over the edge]
Nobody's going to leave my town, everyone's going to die!
Get that scum. MAKE HIM PAY!
You lose, big guy!
[blows Mr. X up with a rocket launcher]
Those monsters from Umbrella, they have ruined my beautiful town. How could they do this after everything I have done for them?
[Robert Kendo thinks that Claire is a zombie when she enters the store]
Freeze! (pointing the bow gun) Who are you? What are you doing here?
Don't shoot! I'm a human
Oh! Sorry about that babe! I thought that you we're one of them!
What's going on in this town?
I don't have a clue darlin! By the time I noticed something was wrong. The entire city was infested with zombies.
Are you telling me that he injected the G-virus into his own body?
The G-virus has the ability to revitalize cellular functions.
It's sheer perfection. My precious G-virus. No one will ever take you away from me.
[after Ada falls over the railing, Leon takes the G-Virus vial out of his pocket]
So... this is what everyone is dying for!
[Leon throws the vial off the catwalk]

[points gun at Leon]
You! You murdered my husband! I know what you're looking for! You came for the G-Virus, didn't you? Well, you're not taking this from me, this is my husband's legacy! Now... where's that spy you were working with earlier? You know who I'm talking about...
What?
You really don't know anything, do you? You're so gullible! She is a spy... the only reason she came here is to obtain the G-Virus...
That's a lie!
No, it's the truth... She specifically got close to the researcher John and became his girlfriend, to get information about the G-Virus...
That can't be! I know her... Ada wouldn't do something like that!
If you don't want to listen, I don't really care. You're about to die anyway...
[laboratory begins shaking]
What's happening?
[screams as a piece of ceiling crashes down on her]
It's over.
No. I have to find my brother.
You're right. This is just the beginning.

[talk to Leon via radio]
Leon, you there? We're leaving.
Are you crazy? The streets are crawling with zombies!
It'll be okay. I found a way out through the sewers. Follow us later!
Claire. Claire! Wait, wait!
[Claire turns off the radio]
Man, why doesn't anyone ever listen to me?
When I saw the uniform I thought that you were another zombie.
Hey, it's up to us to take out Umbrella.
